query:
SELECT
            u.id,
            u.username,
            u.display_name,
            u.avatar_url,
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM auth_device_sessions ads
                WHERE ads.user_id = u.id
                AND ads.device_fingerprint = $1
                AND ads.pin_hash IS NOT NULL
            ) as has_pin_on_device
        FROM users u
        -- No soft delete check needed
        ORDER BY u.username
